DarkRoom.description:
'Occasional selfies are acceptable, but posting a new picture of yourself every day isnâ€™t necessary'

		Named as 2013's word of the year by Oxford Dictionaries, a 'SELFIE' is a type of self-portrait photograph, typically taken with a hand-held digital camera or camera phone. Selfies are often associated with social networking that today's youth enjoy surfing the most. They are often casual, are typically taken either with a camera held at arm's length or in a mirror.
DarkRoom.format: It is an online event for both boys and girls. Participants have to email us their selfie at fotoroom.culrav@gmail.com, which we will post on our facebook page. Top ten liked selfies(5 Girls, 5 Boys) will be considered for final judgement.
rules: 1. Selfie should be like a selfie as per the definition above.
2. Each participant has to email us only one entry. In case more than one entry is noticed, we will consider the prior.
3. No post production is allowed, except for color correction. You may use camera filters.

DarkRoom.description: Streetograph is an event related to Street photography. Street photography features the human condition within public places and does not necessitate the presence of a street or even the urban environment. The subject of the photograph might be absent of people and can be object or environment where the image projects a decidedly human character in facsimile or aesthetic. The origin of the term 'Street' refers to a time rather than a place.
DarkRoom.format: Streetograph is an online event. For 10 days before the fest, every day we will give you a theme. Based on the theme, you have to email us your click at fotoroom.culrav@gmail.com. These photos will also be uploaded on our facebook page. Results will be judged by professionals of the field.
rules: 1. Clicks should adhere to the theme
2. Photograph should be original work of the participant
3. Composition of photograph matters a lot
4. You are allowed to do colour correction, and finer adjustments
5. Removal of elements from the photograph is not allowed
6. You have to mail us original and edited work.

DarkRoom.description:
'Story telling through photography.'

		A photo story is a group of photographs that conveys a unified and compelling story.
DarkRoom.format: In this event participants has to email us few photographs, which tells a story related to any topic of their interest.
rules: 1. Photo story should include minimum five and maximum seven photographs
4. Photo story should be based on a strong idea

DarkRoom.description: Spiritfest gives you a chance to showcase your skills of event photography. In this event we will give you a theme, and ask you to click during the fest. You have to register for the event before the festival. Be prepared.
